channel.title: Paying Cash if someone can make these
channel.description:
Hello all, if you dont have paypal then theres no point responding as thats how i will pay.
Here is the list of scripts that i want and what i want them to do:
Miner Banker
I Want a miner for all ores with these locations: Lumy swamp with banking at draynor Coal Trucks with fill and empty minning cart with banking at camelot Guild miner with fally east banking Yanille (iron,MIth) with banking at yanille
Runcrafter and banker: Air rune crafter fally east banking Fire Crafter AL Kharid banking Law crafter with draynor banking Nature crafter (sells ess to shop and buys unoted) No banking - and if the charcter gets to half health logs out.
Flax picker and spinner Picks flax spins then banks
Smelt and smith (not running together but i want to choose what action) Smelting AL kharid Smithing Varok Smelt ores into bars: Iron - Steel - Mith - Addy - Rune Smiths bars into knives, cannon balls, arrow heads
Im not looking at shitty scripts i want something with quality and that works not something that will get lost die or log out. These scripts will be used on my main account hence why i want quality.
I dont care if the script takes a little longer to do what its doing as long as its good.
I want the script as automatic as possible including colour picking. I want it to log in if it logs out
Remember people i will be paying in cash.
Here is a link of a great example of how i want it to run.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/in...opic,49.0.html

item.title: Paying Cash if someone can make these
item.dc:creator: @2spesh4u 2spesh4u
item.description:
@2spesh4u wrote:

I dont want all this in one script

I want a script for each, im paying anywhere between $5 and willing to go up to $30 depending wich script and how good it is and what it does.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 28, 2007, 06:10:16 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Rune Hacker, post:3, topic:85034”]It’s hard enough to make 1 long, reliable script…If your expecting all thouse, then good luck. Bes tthing for you to do it either use scripts here or become a member there and get much better scripts in the members section (Im a member)[/quote]
Sadly i dont have the time to learn to make scar scripts, last application i made was over 4 years ago in VB6 and since then have left the IT industry. [br][size=1]Posted on: April 28, 2007, 06:13:23 PM[/size][hr]Come on guys!

I realy need a good flax picker and spinner

Read full topic
item.source: Paying Cash if someone can make these
